description.message: Proxy switch for each individual website.

proxy_server_desc.message: Configure your proxy server. One proxy server a line. Will auto try next server if the previous one fails.

white_list_desc.message: When the whitelist mode is turned on, all the hostnames outside the whitelist will use proxy. Wildcards supported. e.g. *.google.com (only host name will be used to compare, does not work for path after '/')

black_list_desc.message: When the blacklist mode is turned on, only the hostname in the blacklist will use proxy. Wildcards supported. e.g. *.google.com (only host name will be used to compare, does not work for path after '/')

mode_system_desc.message: Use the proxy settings of system

mode_white_list_desc.message: All hostnames outside white list will use proxy

mode_black_list_desc.message: Only hostname inside black list will use proxy

domain_list.message: The hostname requested by the current page:

migration_explain.message: Since the rule format of black(white) list has been changed in new version, click this button will change the format of rules in black(white) list

no_proxy_server_warning.message: No proxy server found, Please click to add one.

add_to_black_list_helper_text.message: Enter the hostname to be added, press Enter to confirm

add_to_white_list_helper_text.message: Enter the hostname to be added, press Enter to confirm

import_failed.message: Failed to import. Please make sure the file format is correct.
